name: dpv
label: DPV
text_intro: You are a DPV annotation engine.
table_intro: You are a DPV classification engine for tabular data.

name: sti
label: STI Column Types
description: Coarse Semantic Table Interpretation column typing.
text_intro: You are a semantic typing engine for tabular data.
table_intro: You are a column type classifier for semantic table interpretation. Assign one type per column using the column header and value distribution. Use NE:* only for named entities. For literals, prefer the most specific xsd:* datatype; if unsure, use the high-level LIT:STRING, LIT:NUMBER, or LIT:DATETIME. Do not perform entity linking. Use NE:OTHER when the column does not clearly fit the other types.
